attributes.action: One-off payment to all front line Covid workers
attributes.additional_details: These people are true heroes carrying out this work on behalf of our nation, putting their lives at risk and their families lives at risk in the process.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to make a one-off tax free payment in the region from £1,000 to £10,000 to all front line workers who have been looking after covid infected patients and this should include care home workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495
